language.lblmicrophone: Adjust the sensitivity of the microphone
language.lblmin: the lowest captures all the sounds from the mic without filters
language.lblmax: while the maximum value does not capture any sound
language.lblsavemessage: Do you want save this chat session?
language.lblnomessage: No, I do not to save them.
language.lblyesmessage: Yes, I want to save them:
